description: SBS files can only be opened by Substance Designer and Substance Player. They are often referred to as "source files," which must be published, or "compiled," into .SBSAR files (substances) for use in other programs, such as Substance Painter, Unity, Unreal Engine 4, Maya, 3ds Max, or Cinema 4D.
